name: Super Skater Kid
description:
My entry for the GBJam 5 Game Jam.

Skate through 3 levels!

The controls are these:

  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • Z (On Ground) - Jump
  • Z (In Air) - Do Trick

Mash Z in the air to do as many tricks as you can before you land and build up multipliers.

If you hit an obstacle or land while doing a trick, you'll lose all your multipliers.

There are three levels and two endings.

Changelog:

v1.02

  • Increased backwards speed by a small amount.

v1.01

  • Fixed the Engrish in the endings.
